name: Datadog
description: This plugin is used to ingest Alerts, Events, Logs and Web transactions to the Datadog platform. This plugin provides support for the ingestion of JSON and CEF formatted logs.

configuration.label: Datadog Site
configuration.description: The site associated with your Datadog account. For example: datadoghq.com.

configuration.label: API Key
configuration.description: An API Key is required by the Datadog Agent to submit metrics and events to Datadog. Provide the Datadog API Key from 'Organization Settings > Access > API Keys' on the Datadog platform.

configuration.label: Datadog Tags
configuration.description: Tags associated with your logs. For example: env:prod,region:us-east-1
